divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a "cruiser" or what I call the glowing white or multicolored lights that cruise through the sky and make no sound. These are becoming commonplace however, I haven't seen many in Ludington. Immediately after this particular sighting a plane flew by heading a somewhat similar trajectory. It was shining lights down on the ground and shined one right on me.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ludington
There were no other sightings in Ludington on or around September 15th 2012
Summary: Typical Glowing Cruiser - Airplane shining lights down on me afterwards
